Speaker: Nicole Beringer

Language: English

Media: Video

Is OSM ready to compete with the commercial maps in cars?

Since OSM is based on direct user feedback and continuous map improvements, automotive software companies are at the forefront of adopting this new technology.

Elektrobit Automotive, a global automotive software company brings into discussion the following topics:

  • Today’s assessment of the in-vehicle navigation systems
  • Potential of using OSM in automotive and implications
  • Long term outlook for OSM in automotive context
  • Expanding the value of OSM: partnerships with automotive software companies
